text: vāṉattilum, pūmiyilum avarkaḷukku muṉṉāluḷḷataiyum avarkaḷukkup piṉṉāluḷḷataiyum avarkaḷ pārkka villaiyā? Nām nāṭiṉāl avarkaḷai pūmiyiṉuḷ coruki viṭuvōm; allatu vāṉattiliruntu avarkaḷ mītu oru tuṇṭai viḻacceytu (avarkaḷai aḻittu) viṭuvōm; (allāhvaiyē) muṉṉōkki niṟkum ovvōr aṭiyāṉukkum niccayamāka itil ōr attāṭci irukkiṟatu
